sections.title: Arcanist (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Arcanist class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiencies (Arcanist)
sections.description: Arcanists are proficient with all simple weapons but no armor or shields, as armor interferes with spells that have somatic components.

sections.title: Spell Casting (Arcanist)
sections.description: Arcanists prepare spells from the sorcerer/wizard spell list but don't expend them when cast, instead consuming spell slots per day like a sorcerer. They can apply metamagic feats either during preparation or casting.

sections.title: Spellbooks (Arcanist)
sections.description: Arcanists must study spellbooks daily to prepare spells, starting with all 0-level spells and gaining additional spells as they level.

sections.title: Cantrips (Arcanist)
sections.description: Arcanists can prepare and cast 0-level spells that don't consume spell slots and aren't expended when cast.

sections.title: Arcane Reservoir (Su) (Arcanist)
sections.description: A pool of magical energy equal to 3 + arcanist level that refills daily and can be spent to enhance spells with +1 caster level or +1 DC as a free action.

sections.title: Arcanist Exploits (Arcanist)
sections.description: Special magical abilities learned every 2 levels that exploit gaps in magical laws, most requiring arcane reservoir points to function.

sections.title: Consume Spells (Su) (Arcanist)
sections.description: As a move action, expend an available spell slot to gain arcane reservoir points equal to the spell level, usable Charisma modifier times per day.

sections.title: Greater Exploits (Arcanist)
sections.description: More powerful arcanist exploits available starting at 11th level and every 2 levels thereafter in place of regular exploits.

sections.title: Magical Supremacy (Su) (Arcanist)
sections.description: At 20th level, cast prepared spells by spending reservoir points equal to 1 + spell level, gaining +2 caster level and +2 DC but cannot enhance further with reservoir.

sections.title: Deep Reservoir (Su) (Arcanist)
sections.description: At 20th level, the arcane reservoir maximum increases by 10 and daily point generation increases by 5.
